scripts.dev: printf 'y\n' | wrangler d1 migrations apply WAITLIST_DB --local --persist-to .wrangler/state && wrangler dev --local --persist-to .wrangler/state --test-scheduled --port 8888
scripts.db:migrate:local: printf 'y\n' | wrangler d1 migrations apply WAITLIST_DB --local --persist-to .wrangler/state
scripts.loop:enable:local: wrangler kv key put loop:config '{"enabled":true}' --binding CONFIG_KV --preview --local --persist-to .wrangler/state
scripts.loop:disable:local: wrangler kv key put loop:config '{"enabled":false}' --binding CONFIG_KV --preview --local --persist-to .wrangler/state
scripts.loop:config:dca:local: wrangler kv key put loop:config --path ./examples/loop-config.dca.dry-run.json --binding CONFIG_KV --preview --local --persist-to .wrangler/state
scripts.loop:config:dca:simulate:local: wrangler kv key put loop:config --path ./examples/loop-config.dca.simulate.json --binding CONFIG_KV --preview --local --persist-to .wrangler/state
scripts.loop:config:rebalance:local: wrangler kv key put loop:config --path ./examples/loop-config.rebalance.dry-run.json --binding CONFIG_KV --preview --local --persist-to .wrangler/state
